title: Update Customer with Revised ETA
description: A driver is delayed by weather. The dispatcher must provide the customer with a new estimated time of arrival (ETA).

tasks.description: The driver reports a delay due to a snowstorm.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher logs the delay reason.

tasks.description: The system recalculates the ETA based on the driver's current location and the reduced speed.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, later ETA is generated.

tasks.description: The dispatcher sends an automated notification to the customer with the revised ETA.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is proactively informed of the delay.
